laserschein
Class LD2000Adaptor

java.lang.Object
  laserschein.AbstractLaserOutput
      laserschein.LD2000Adaptor

public class LD2000Adaptor
extends AbstractLaserOutput

Uses the Pangolin SDK to control a Pangolin QM2000 or QM2000.net via Laserschein. Works on windows for now.

Author:
allesblinkt
